message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a special price. I think you'll really love it!
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. That price is a little high for me. Could you do $70?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I can do a bit better than my previous offer, but I need to make a profit. How about $85?
I appreciate you coming down a bit, Alice.  How about we meet in the middle at $77?
I'm glad we're close, Bob. I can do a bit better than $77. How about $82.50?
This is a fair offer Alice, but I'm on a tight budget.  Could you do $80?
